data.name: Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

It's ANGRY VIDEO GAME NERD - THE MOVIE! Based on the hit web series, AVGN: The Movie follows the Nerd (James Rolfe), a disgruntled gamer and online celebrity who must overcome his fear of the worst video game of all time in order to save his fans. Hilarity ensues as a simple road trip becomes an extravagant pursuit of the unexpected.
data.about_the_game: It's ANGRY VIDEO GAME NERD - THE MOVIE! Based on the hit web series, AVGN: The Movie follows the Nerd (James Rolfe), a disgruntled gamer and online celebrity who must overcome his fear of the worst video game of all time in order to save his fans. Hilarity ensues as a simple road trip becomes an extravagant pursuit of the unexpected.
data.short_description: A disgruntled gamer/internet celebrity must overcome his phobia of the worst video game in the world to save his fans.
data.reviews:
“Review: "Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie" is a hilarious and heartwarming love letter to the fans”
Fade To Lack

“Wayne’s World movie meets Pee Wee’s Big Adventure”
MUST SEE – Segabits

“This is the type of movie from original sources that movies should aim to be like.”
3.5 out of 4 stars – The Movie Wizard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
